description.displayText:
Our dear friend Dolores was the nanny of our two children for 11 years.  She joined our family when our son was 3 months old and cared of him and our second child, a daughter, who was born 4 years after Dolores joined us.

Dolores was more than a nanny - she was a second mother to our children and a cherished friend to us all.  The children flourished under the love and care and nurturing of Dolores.  They loved her and still keep in touch with her.

I would highly recommend that Dolores join your family and that you treat her with love and respect - as she will you.
description.originalText:
Our dear friend Dolores was the nanny of our two children for 11 years.  She joined our family when our son was 3 months old and cared of him and our second child, a daughter, who was born 4 years after Dolores joined us.

Dolores was more than a nanny - she was a second mother to our children and a cherished friend to us all.  The children flourished under the love and care and nurturing of Dolores.  They loved her and still keep in touch with her.

I would highly recommend that Dolores join your family and that you treat her with love and respect - as she will you.
